QuestData.Title: A Short Fuse
QuestData.Description: As you light the fuse, you notice that it is consumed by fire far quicker than you would expect.$B$BThe bombs are about to go off and your best chance at surviving is to lean towards the pit and hope the fall doesn't kill you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Look for clues wherever the fall takes you.
QuestData.RewardText: This pulsing object is covered in a thick layer of ice. It shimmers strangely beneath the water.
